channel.description: Recent content in Guides on Site Bay Guides & Tutorials

item.title: Access Billing Information
item.description: Most information and settings pertaining to billing are located within the Billing Info page of the My Site Bay.

item.title: Make a Payment
item.description: Pay Your BillWhen an invoice is generated, the default payment method on the account is automatically charged within a few hours.

item.title: Manage Payment Methods
item.description: See Adding a New Payment Method for instructions on adding a new payment method to your account.

item.title: Referral Program
item.description: When you refer a new user to Site Bay through our referral program, both you and the new user can receive a promotional credit.

item.title: Stop Further Billing
item.description: To prevent additional charges from accruing and stop further billing, you can remove any paid services from your account or cancel your account entirely.

item.title: View Invoices and Payment History
item.description: All of your billing history, including previous invoices and payments, is accessible within the My Site Bay on the Billing & Payment History section within the Billing Info page (see Accessing Billing Information).

item.title: Update the Billing Contact Information on Your Account
item.description: Use the Billing Info page to update the contact information for the Site Bay account. The email address saved on this webpage receives invoices, receipts, and credit card expiration warnings.

item.title: Tax Information
item.description: Some countries, states, and regions require us by law to collect taxes. As such, customers located in these locations are charged the appropriate tax rate for any taxable services billed to their account.
